TestDescription.name: Snoop Servlet information disclosure
TestDescription.Description: The Application Snoop Servlet in IBM WebSphere Application Server 7.0 before 7.0.0.23 does not properly restrict access, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive client and request information via a direct request.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker could obtain request and client information.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict access to the Snoop servlet URL or install the latest version of IBM WebSphere Application Server.

Reference.database: IBM WebSphere Application Server snoop servlet information disclosure
